data.title: November 3, 2020 General Election — San Francisco Democratic Party
data.meta_description: These are the San Francisco Democratic Party’s official endorsements for November 3, 2020 General Election:    CANDIDATES    Congress (CD 12):  Nancy Pelosi   Congress (CD 14):  Jackie Speier    State Senate (SD 11):  Scott Wiener   Assembly District 17:&
data.text:
Board of Supervisors

District 1: Connie Chan

District 3: Aaron Peskin

District 5: Dean Preston

District 7: #1 Myrna Melgar, #2 Vilaska Nguyen

District 9: Hillary Ronen

District 11: #1 John Avalos, #2 Ahsha Safai

Community College Board (4 seats): Shanell Williams Tom Temprano, Alan Wong, Han Zou

Board of Education (4 seats): Kevin Boggess, Matt Alexander, Mark Sanchez, Jenny Lam

BART Board District 7: Lateefah Simon

BART Board District 9: Bevan Dufty

Supervisor Candidates: A complete breakdown of SFDCCC Members’ votes can be found here.

BART Board, Board of Education, College Board: A complete breakdown of SFDCCC Members’ votes can be found here

BALLOT MEASURES

PROP A: Health and Homelessness, Parks, and Streets Bond - YES

PROP B: Department of Sanitation and Streets, Sanitation and Streets Commission, and Public Works Commission - YES

PROP C: Removing Citizenship Requirements for Members of City Bodies - YES

PROP D: Sheriff Oversight - YES

PROP E: Police Staffing- YES

PROP F: Business Tax Overhaul - YES

PROP G: Youth Voting in Local Elections - YES

PROP H: Neighborhood Commercial Districts and City Permitting - YES

PROP I: Real Estate Transfer Tax - YES

PROP J: Parcel Tax for San Francisco Unified School District - YES

PROP K: Affordable Housing Authorization - YES

PROP L: Business Tax Based on Comparison of Top Executive's Pay to Employees' Pay - YES

MEASURE RR: Caltrain Sales Tax - YES

Ballot Measures: A complete breakdown of SFDCCC Members’ votes can be found here.

State Propositions

By our bylaw, we cannot endorsement State propositions, it’s the role of the California Democratic Party.

HERE is the endorsement of the California Democratic Party.
